title: Is there an official page where all the clarification we've gotten on boards is stated?

replies.body:
The EU volunteers put together a library of tribunal related sources and we do our best to keep it as up to date as possible (http://en.volu-eu.org/library.php ) \#shamelessselfpromotion

Unfortunately this comes with a disclaimer that volunteers are not official Rioters, so it does not count as an official Riot webpage.

http://en.volu-eu.org/library.php

There ya go, this should work.
Somehow, the last bracket was part of the link in my previous post, fixed it now.
Thanks, I hope Riot will be able to refer to it in one of their official pages, but even if they don't, this is a great resource.

Adding to what Tosha said: We are in contact with Riot, the articles we wrote have been checked by them, and we have a line of communication to keep everything in there up-to-date!

I already suggested that we introduce a "newest changes" tab, so it'll hopefully be more convenient to learn about the newest changes in the future :)
if anything, it will be in the client instead of on the boards.
Thats also a good idea. I think people would apprieciate official clarification.
